T02TD2731E:108a-1: a'ary'a ba lo ki te shva r'a ya sto tra /
T02TD2731E:108a-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bstod pa /
T02TD2731E:108a-4: 'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2731E:108a-6: ge sar dkyil na spyan ras gzigs //
T02TD2731E:108a-7: man 'dzi'i ri dang mchod phreng g-yas//
T02TD2731E:108a-9: spyan gsum dbu la 'od dpag med //
T02TD2731E:108a-10: shel gyi ri ltar dkar ba ste //
T02TD2731E:108a-11: rin chen rgyan gyis rnam par spras //
T02TD2731E:108a-12: ma chags dkyil 'khor gtso la bstod //
T02TD2731E:108a-13: don yod zhags pa sdug bsngal 'dren //
T02TD2731E:108a-14: spyan gsum phyag bzhi rgyan gyis bklubs //
T02TD2731E:108a-15: rdo rje dang ni zhags pa g-yas //
T02TD2731E:108a-16: g-yon pa padmo lcags kyu dang //
T02TD2731E:108a-17: 'od dpag med kyi dbu rgyan mtho //
T02TD2731E:108a-18: dmar skya phyed ba skum phyed ldan bstod //
T02TD2731E:108a-19: kro dha mgrin sngon gdug pa sel //
T02TD2731E:108a-20: zhal gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhi ste //
T02TD2731E:108a-21: g-yas na rdo rje be con 'dzin //
T02TD2731E:108a-22: sdigs mdzub padma zum pha g-yon //
T02TD2731E:108a-23: sbrul dang stag lpags sku brgyan pa //
T02TD2731E:108a-24: dmar po rta dbur ldan la bstod //
T02TD2731E:108a-25: do ker gcig ma bran bzhin nyan //
T02TD2731E:108a-26: spyan gsum phyag brgyad shin tu khro //
T02TD2731E:108a-27: rdo rje ral gri be con dang //
T02TD2731E:108a-28: thod ba g-yas na 'dzin pa ste //
T02TD2731E:108a-29: dgra ste shakti thod zhags g-yon //
T02TD2731E:108a-30: mthing nag glang gzigs dpa' gang bstod //
T02TD2731E:108b-0: khro gnyer can ni @108b bka' bzhin byed //
T02TD2731E:108b-1: zhal gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhir ldan //
T02TD2731E:108b-2: bgrang phreng phyag 'tshal thal mo g-yas //
T02TD2731E:108b-4: rin chen rgyan ldan shel ltar dkar //
T02TD2731E:108b-5: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar ldan bstod //
T02TD2731E:108b-6: tshim par mdzad dang mdzes par mdzad //
T02TD2731E:108b-7: snang bar mdzad dang bde bar mdzad //
T02TD2731E:108b-8: rgyal ba'i yon tan mdzes tshul 'dzin //
T02TD2731E:108b-9: lha mo rmad byung bzhi la bstod //
T02TD2731E:108b-10: sgo yi dbus na bzhugs pa gang //
T02TD2731E:108b-11: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrogs dril //
T02TD2731E:108b-12: tshad med bzhi yi ngo bo nyid //
T02TD2731E:108b-13: sgo skyong rnam pa bzhi la bstod //
T02TD2731E:108b-14: tshangs dbang drag po nyi zla dang //
T02TD2731E:108b-15: phyogs bzhi'i 'jig rten skyong la sogs //
T02TD2731E:108b-16: gtsang ma rigs kyi srung mar bcas //
T02TD2731E:108b-17: rnam kun 'khor ldan kun la bstod //
T02TD2731E:108b-18: mi rtog ye shes khyad par las //
T02TD2731E:108b-19: sems can kun la thugs brtse'i phyir //
T02TD2731E:108b-20: phrin las bzhi yis don mdzad pa //
T02TD2731E:108b-21: dkyil 'khor grva gnas bzhi la bstod //
T02TD2731E:108b-22: khyod kyi yon tan dpag med las //
T02TD2731E:108b-23: shin tu phra ba'i cha blangs nas //
T02TD2731E:108b-24: mngon sum lta bur dad dmigs pas //
T02TD2731E:108b-25: khyed ltar yon tan rab rdzogs shog /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor dang bcas pa la bstod pa /
T02TD2731E:108b-26: slob dpon tsandra go mis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
